tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_spending ( 
  customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
  transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, 
  transaction_amount DECIMAL, 
  category VARCHAR, 
  recommendation VARCHAR 
)

CREATE TABLE customer_info ( 
  customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
  first_name VARCHAR, 
  last_name VARCHAR, 
  email VARCHAR, 
  phone_number VARCHAR 
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    transaction_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE recommendations (
    recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    recommendation TEXT,
    recommendation_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_personal_info (
  customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name STRING,
  email STRING,
  phone_number STRING
)

CREATE TABLE customer_transactions (
  transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id UUID REFERENCES customer_personal_info(customer_id),
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
  amount DECIMAL,
  category STRING
)

CREATE TABLE financial_advice (
  advice_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id UUID REFERENCES customer_personal_info(customer_id),
  advice_text STRING,
  advice_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE recommendation_history (
  recommendation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id UUID REFERENCES customer_personal_info(customer_id),
  recommendation_text STRING,
  recommendation_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE CustomerProfiles (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID REFERENCES CustomerProfiles(customer_id),
    amount DECIMAL,
    category VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_date DATE,
    description VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE SpendingCategories (
    category_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Recommendations (
    recommendation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID REFERENCES CustomerProfiles(customer_id),
    recommendation_text TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE FinancialGoals (
    goal_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID REFERENCES CustomerProfiles(customer_id),
    goal_description TEXT,
    target_amount DECIMAL,
    deadline DATE
)
